name: Operation: Cable Jumper
description:
Hello and welcome to the Coordinated Universal Training Enviroment (C.U.T.E)!

Here at Vintergatan United we are always looking for brave pilots willing to protect our galaxy from threats known and unknows. Through CUTE we can find the best of the best together. Simply download the simulation programme and try your best at completing the mission at hand. Our expert agents will contact you if deemed worthy!

Now, we only trust the best of the best with our cutting-edge space vessels. This is because their unique movement and weapon systems have still not been deemed safe by the United Nations and may be prone to impromptu combustion at low energy levels.

This is where you come in. Our new J.U.M.P.E.R. C.A.B.L.E. system will absorb energy released by terminated enemy vessels, giving you some extra time to work with. Make sure to use it well, or disaster will be inevitable.

We hope you will find success in our tests and we trust that you report back if any issues occur. Godspeed!
